quest.name: The Robot and the Sea
journal:
There is still much Stigma-4 would learn of the Grebuloffs' new home.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested sample to the analysis unit.
objectives: Mine [Error] from the Elysian seas.Deliver [Error] to the analysis unit.Gather [Error] from the Elysian seas.Catch [Error] from the Elysian seas.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analysis indicates that the Grebuloffs continue to abide on Elysion without difficulty. However, data insufficiencies remain regarding the oceans created through their influence on dynamis.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: With sufficient data, it will be possible to preserve such ocean environments and improve Grebuloff well-being. Initiating research and analysis protocol...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Samples of limestone coral are required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the samples in the analysis unit.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Elysian cucumber samples are required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the samples in the analysis unit.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: An Elysian nudibranch sample is required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the sample in the analysis unit.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: For maximum efficiency, use of gold salmon roe is strongly advised. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04614
dialogue.text:
Scanning inventory... Unidentified substances detected. Potential value and utilization factors...unclear.
Standing by for oceanic samples.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04614
dialogue.text: Scanning inventory... Oceanic samples detected. Please insert for analysis.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04614
dialogue.text: Analyzing... Sample possesses bacteria given to releasing foreign particulates. Olfactory sensors reaching critical.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04614
dialogue.text: Conclusion: oceanic life-forms are prone to...unfavorable odor. Additional specimens required for further analysis.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04614
dialogue.text: Conclusion: ocean life-forms remain prone to unfavorable odor. Probability of fragrant life unlikely. Additional specimens required for further analysis.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Report from analysis unit received. Your contribution was deemed beneficial to research on Elysion's oceanic environment.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: However, data insufficiencies remain. If discovered bacteria is present in all oceanic life-forms, verification of potential dissemination to other non-oceanic hosts is required.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Proposal: submerge the redolent, fluffy manager in ocean water, and monitor odor fluctuations. Upon conclusion of this experiment, deployment of military-grade lasers may be authorized for decontamination purposes.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Periodic analysis of new specimens is required for continued research and environmental preservation. Your future cooperation is greatly appreciated.
